sentence.Network_en: He lived on an invalidity pension which came as a weekly giro.
sentence.Network_cn: 他靠每周领取的作为病残养老金的直接转账救济支票过日子。

sentence.Network_en: The contributions employees pay give cover against sickness, including chronic invalidity.
sentence.Network_cn: 员工的定期缴款用来支付生病的花费，包括长期病残的开销。

sentence.Network_en: I live on an invalidity pension.

entry.def: Invalidity is the state of being an invalid.

example.ex: The contributions employees pay give cover against sickness, including chronic invalidity...
example.tran: 员工的定期缴款用来支付生病的花费,包括长期病残的开销。

example.ex: I live on an invalidity pension.

means.word_mean: 1. illogicality as a consequence of having a conclusion that does not follow from the premisses

auth_sentence.content: Suspicion of the invalidity of the evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suspicion of the invalidity of the evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suspicion of the invalidity of the evidence.

auth_sentence.content: For Blanchot, as indeed for Beckett, language is always announcing its invalidity.
auth_sentence.res_content: For Blanchot, as indeed for Beckett, language is always announcing its invalidity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For Blanchot, as indeed for Beckett, language is always announcing its invalidity.

auth_sentence.content: So if you want to show anyone PROOF of evolutions invalidity youre going to need to go somewhere else.

stems_affixes.word_buile: equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
equi平等+val价值+ence表名词→同等价值

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有效性, 合法性, 正确性
stems_affixes.word_buile: valid[adj.有效的, 有根据的,正确的]+ity表名词→n.有效性, 合法性, 正确性
con全部+val强壮+escence开始……→全身开始强壮起来→恢复健康
equi+val价值+ent……的,也表示物→同等价值
val强壮+or表名词→n.英勇, 勇猛

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使有效, 使生效, 确认, 证实, 验证
stems_affixes.word_buile: valid[adj.有效的, 有根据的,正确的]+ate使……→v.使有效, 使生效, 确认, 证实, 验证
